email.subject: RE:To #PLAYERNAME#
email.body:
Oh my gods, finally.
Do you even /know/ how aggravating it was to have your battlestation chirping at you like a mindless bird or something? FINALLY IT'S OVER.
Apparently the company uses the WebOroboros worm program to break into their targets and inject an adbot through the opened port. While I don't normally condone wrecking systems, these guys deserved it.
Anyways, hold onto WebOroboros, it'll come in handy to you as a hacker. I'm relieved- SOMEONE was able to stop the adbot, but I'm still keeping my guard up until I can find a patch to keep out WebOroboros.
Anyways- next mission.
I need you to retrieve a password from one of my backup computers. I would do it myself, but it's a tablet, and I can't seem to locate it right now. It's probably plugged in, so you should still be able to access it- I'm still busy scrubbing the remnants of the adbot out of my systems.
The password is CASE SENSITIVE. Please reply with it as soon as you have it. It's for something very important.
I'm counting on you. -Zaz

attachments.note: Obtain the password Zaz needs from the linked node. Check in any text files.
